Uses of Package
rsa_encryption

  • Classes in rsa_encryption used by rsa_encryption
    Class
    Description
    ChatParticipant
    A participant in a chat that can receive and send messages to a chat partner.
    CryptoFileString
    Class to manage decrypted/encrypted files (or just text).
    Key
    The Key interface provides methods for generating and retrieving keys.
    KeyPair
    The KeyPair class represents a pair of RSA keys, consisting of a public key and a private key.
    PrivateKey
    The PrivateKey class implements the Key interface and represents an RSA private key.
    PublicKey
    The PublicKey class implements the Key interface and represents an RSA public key.
